title: "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the pvp.net server..."

replies.body:
It sounds like you've worked through our login issues guide already. Some other factors that can prevent you from logging in is if there are local network settings that conflict with League. Following all the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should assist in further troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps were the resolve.
I'm gonna read the guide and see if it helps me, I'll update you.
Update: It hasn't helped me out. Still getting the same error.
